author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Transport Department will operate a special counter at the office of the Regional Transport Office here to collect road tax for transport and non-transport vehicles for the year 2016-17.

In a release, Transport Commissioner S.D. Sundaresan said the counter would function from March 24 to 31 during office hours. The tax schedule would be exhibited at all collection counters. Penalty would be levied on those vehicle owners who fail to make the tax payment on time, he said.
title: Special counter for road tax collection
